item.title: Mu4e Tags to Address
item.description: I use emacs for email and org capture to keep track of my open loops. Recently I have been trying to combine the two and capture tasks that link to emails. I wanted to tag my capture items based on the inbox they fall into, :@home: for my personal and :@school for my school emails. I cobbled together this function based upon different stackexchange posts and figured I would share it here for anyone who wanted to do the same.
